main event: An extremely bright light was observed falling straight down and then up again, changing colors and appearing to be under controlled motion.
interesting points: The light was approximately 50 yards wide with a white light or globe in the center.
The light was followed by a trail of what appeared to be smoke or burning debris.
The motion of the light was smooth and controlled.
The second report describes an aircraft sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) that was tracked for 1 minute and 35 seconds.
The UFO was sighted bearing 205 degrees, with a speed of 3000 feet per minute, and a heading of 350 degrees until lost from sight.
